Footer.tagline: Your trusted partner for government scheme assistance
Footer.disclaimer: Disclaimer: ShasanSeva is a paid assistance platform. We do not guarantee approval of any scheme. We provide professional assistance with document handling and application support.

HomePage.ourServicesSubtitle: Browse schemes by category and find the right support for your needs
HomePage.mobileAppDescription: Apply for schemes, track applications, and receive instant updates - all from your smartphone. Download our mobile app for a seamless experience.
HomePage.exploreSubtitle: Stay updated with the latest information

HEALTH.name: Health Schemes

WOMEN.name: Women Welfare
WOMEN.description: Special schemes and programs designed for women empowerment.

SENIOR.name: Senior Citizens

OTHER.name: Other Services

ApplyPage.uploadSubtitle: Upload your documents now, or skip and upload them later from your orders page.
ApplyPage.skipNote: You can proceed to payment without uploading documents. Our team will contact you for any missing documents.
ApplyPage.disclaimer: By proceeding, you agree that you have provided accurate documents. The service fee is for application assistance only. Scheme approval depends on eligibility criteria.
ApplyPage.paymentInstructions: Please complete the payment in the Razorpay window...
ApplyPage.successMessage: Your payment was successful and your application is now being processed.
ApplyPage.nextStep1: Our team will verify your documents
ApplyPage.nextStep2: You'll receive updates on your application status
ApplyPage.nextStep3: Track your application in your dashboard
